1.content: Who will be the main focus to start an adventure in Diapers and In Potty Training?
1.title: Beginning!

11.content: Which of these will we focus on?
11.title: Tommy Pickles

111.content: Will his parents try out a new brand of diapers?
111.title: Diapers

1111.content: Is it the super absorbent diaper brand that Phil and Lil had to wear for a time in "Acorn Nuts and Diapey Butts"?
1111.title: Sure.

11111.content: Didi was running low on clean diapers, and thought the brand might work?
11111.title: Yes

111112.content: Did Didi buy the new diapers because they were cheaper than the usual brand she bought and she and Stu needed to save whatever money they could because Stu had a dry spell of successful inventions?
111112.title: Another reason they get them.

1111121.content: On being put into the new diaper, did Tommy like it?
1111121.title: Yes

11111212.content:
Unfortunately, Tommy didn't like wearing the new diaper. It was so big and bulky, he could hardly stand up or move in it. He also couldn't fit his screwdriver inside it.

Did he decide to take off his new diaper?
11111212.title: No way.

choices: Stu or Didi Check on Tommy
111112121.content:
Since Tommy didn't like wearing his new puffy diaper, he decided to take it off. However, because of how big and bulky it was, he couldn't even reach the tapes that held it up to untape it, so he decided to try a different strategy to take it off. He grabbed the front of his diaper and grunted as he pulled on it. Eventually, the tapes came undone and he pulled it off. When he got it off, he sighed with relief.

What happens next?
111112121.title: Yes

1111121211.content: One of Tommy's parents came in to check on him. Who was it?
1111121211.title: Stu or Didi Check on Tommy

1112.content: Does Tommy go on some sort of diaper-related adventure?
1112.title: SE

11122.content: Do we find out how Tommy came to love diapers?
11122.title: Something else

111222.content: Does Tommy have difficulty keeping his diaper from falling down?
111222.title: Something else

1112221.content: Was Tommy inside his house or outside it when his diaper fell down?
1112221.title: Yes

11122211.content: Tommy was inside his house when his diaper fell down. Why was it falling down?
11122211.title: Inside

111222112.content: Did someone pull on the tapes of Tommy's diaper?
111222112.title: Another Reason

1112221121.content: Was it Dil who pulled on the tapes of Tommy's diaper?
1112221121.title: Yes

11122211211.content:
Dil grabbed Tommy's diaper tape and pulled on it, causing Tommy's diaper to fall down. Tommy was quick to notice this.

"Dil, quit pulling on my diapie!" Tommy told Dil, but Dil just laughed at him.

What happens next?
11122211211.title: Yes

1112221121221.content: She was able to do this when she was playing with him and the others?
1112221121221.title: Yes

1112221122.content: Did Didi put Tommy's diaper on too loose during his last diaper change?
1112221122.title: No, Something Else happened.

11122211221.content: Who helped him get it back on properly?
11122211221.title: Yes

111222112213.content: Was it Phil and/or Lil?
111222112213.title: Someone else.

1112221122131.content: Did both twins help Tommy put his diaper back on or just one?
1112221122131.title: Yes

choices: Phil Taped Up the Right Side, Lil Taped Up the Left
Phil Taped Up the Left Side, Lil Taped Up the Right
11122211221311.content:
Phil and Lil helped Tommy put his diaper back on.

Did Phil tape up the right side of Tommy's diaper and Lil tape up the left, or vice-versa?
11122211221311.title: Both

choices: No, something else that went wrong.
111222112213111.content: Did both make it too tight, though?
111222112213111.title: Phil Taped Up the Right Side, Lil Taped Up the ...

1112221122131112.content: Was Tommy's diaper too loose and fell down again as a result?
1112221122131112.title: No, something else that went wrong.

choices: They pulled hard enough it ripped.
11122211221311122.content: Tommy peed on one of them?
11122211221311122.title: No, something else.

111222112213111221.content: Which twin did Tommy pee on?
111222112213111221.title: Yup.

1112221122131112212.content:
"Tommy!." Lil yelled.
Did he apologize?
1112221122131112212.title: Lil

11122211221311122121.content:
"Whoops. Sorry, Lil." Tommy said to Lil.

Did Lil accept Tommy's apology?
11122211221311122121.title: Yup.

111222112213111221211.content: She did, but, did she ask him why he'd done it?
111222112213111221211.title: Yes

choices: "It was an accident. I had to pee and my diapie wasn't on yet."
1112221122131112212111.content:
"Tommy, why did you pee on me?" Lil asked Tommy.

What did Tommy tell Lil?
1112221122131112212111.title: Yeah.

11122211221311122121111.content: Lil accepted this. Who took her to get cleaned up?
11122211221311122121111.title: "It was an accident. I had to pee and my di...

111222112213111222.content:
As Phil and Lil tried to tape Tommy's diaper up, they pulled so hard on the tapes that they ripped from the diaper itself, making the diaper unusable.

Did the twins argue over who was to blame?
111222112213111222.title: They pulled hard enough it ripped.

choices: Ran and got a clean diaper to put on Tommy.
1112221122131112221.content:
Both began arguing over who's fault it was.
:You pulled too hard, Lilian."
"You you, Philip."
Chuckie put a stop to that?
1112221122131112221.title: Yes

choices: Ask the Twins Why They Were Arguing
11122211221311122211.title: Yeah.

111222112213111222111.content: Who explained, or tried to explain what had happened?
111222112213111222111.title: Ask the Twins Why They Were Arguing

choices: Somebody Decides to Get Tommy a New Diaper
1112221122131112221111.content:
"Well, Chuckie, my diapie kept falling down, so Phil and Lil tried to tape it up again, but they pulled too hard on the tapes and they ripped off. Now my diapie is ruined and I can't wear it no mores." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh." said Chuckie.

What happens next?
1112221122131112221111.title: Tommy.

11122211221311122211111.content: Is it Chuckie that offers this?
11122211221311122211111.title: Somebody Decides to Get Tommy a New Diaper

111222112213111222111111.content:
"Don't worry, Tommy. I'll get you a new diaper." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Thanks, Chuckie." replied Tommy. Chuckie left the playpen and soon made his way to Tommy's bedroom, where he found Tommy's clean diapers on his changing table. He picked one up.

Did Chuckie take anything else?
111222112213111222111111.title: Yeah.

1112221122131112221111111.content: Did he powder and diaper his friend on coming back with them?
1112221122131112221111111.title: Baby Powder

11122211221311122211111111.content:
"Okay, Tommy. Let's get your diaper on." Chuckie told Tommy. Tommy lay down and pulled up his shirt, then Chuckie powdered his bottom. After that, he taped the clean diaper onto it.

"There you go, Tommy." Chuckie said afterwards.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Tommy said as he gave Chuckie a hug.

What happens next?
11122211221311122211111111.title: Yup.

111222112213111222111112.content: Do both twins volunteer to get Tommy a new diaper or just one?
111222112213111222111112.title: Phil or Lil.

1112221122131112221111121.content:
"Don't worry, Tommy. Me and Lillian will get you a new diapie." Phil told Tommy.

"Really, guys?" Tommy asked Phil.

"Yeah, it's the leastest we could do after ruining your old one." replied Lil. The twins left the playpen and soon made their way to Tommy's bedroom, where they found his clean diapers on his changing table. They picked one up.

Did the twins take anything else?
1112221122131112221111121.title: Both

11122211221311122211111211.content: On returning, did both work at powdering and diapering him?
11122211221311122211111211.title: Baby Powder

choices: Lil Powdered Tommy, Phil Diapered Him
Phil Powdered Tommy, Lil Diapered Him
111222112213111222111112111.content: Did Lil powder Tommy while Phil diapered him, or vice-versa?
111222112213111222111112111.title: Yeah.

1112221122131112221111121112.content: As this was going on, did Chuckie also try to help?
1112221122131112221111121112.title: Phil Powdered Tommy, Lil Diapered Him

11122211221311122211111211121.content: Did Chuckie dispose of the ruined diaper?
11122211221311122211111211121.title: Yup.

111222112213111222111112111211.content: He managed to get rid of the ruined diaper. On returning, had Phil and Lil finished diapering Tommy?
111222112213111222111112111211.title: Yes

111222112213111222111113.content: Does Tommy join Chuckie, Phil, and Lil in getting a new diaper?
111222112213111222111113.title: All 3 of them, or all 4.

1112221122131112221111132.content: Chuckie, Phil and Lil went to Tommy's room to get him a new diaper, but, did they get anything else?
1112221122131112221111132.title: No

11122211221311122211112.content: Did one of the babies dispose of the ruined diaper?
11122211221311122211112.title: Something Else

choices: Chuckie Goes to Tommy's Bedroom to Get Tommy a New Diaper
1112221122131112221111211.content:
Chuckie picked up Tommy's ruined diaper, then he left the playpen and disposed of the ruined diaper in the kitchen trash can.

What happens next?
1112221122131112221111211.title: Yup.

11122211221311122211112111.content: Besides that, does he get anything else?
11122211221311122211112111.title: Chuckie Goes to Tommy's Bedroom to Get Tomm...

11122211221312.content: Which twin helped Tommy put his diaper back on?
11122211221312.title: Just One

111222112213122.content: Did she accidentally put it back on backwards, though?
111222112213122.title: Lil

11122212.content: Tommy was outside his house when his diaper fell down. Why was it falling down?
11122212.title: Outside

111222122.content: Did someone pull on the tapes of Tommy's diaper?
111222122.title: Another Reason

1112221221.content: Was it Dil who pulled on the tapes of Tommy's diaper?
1112221221.title: Yes

1112221222.content: Did Didi put Tommy's diaper on too loose during his last diaper change?
1112221222.title: No, Something Else happened.

choices: Stu and Didi try to Potty-train Him Early
Skip Ahead One Year, When He's 2.
Skip Ahead Two Years, When He's 3.
112.content: Potty training it is. Now, since Tommy is one year old, how does this happen?
112.title: Potty training

1121.content: What story shall we go with?
1121.title: Stu and Didi try to Potty-train Him Early

1122.content: What story shall we go with?
1122.title: Skip Ahead One Year, When He's 2.

choices: He Was Excited to Learn to Use the Potty
He Wished He Could Stay in Diapers Forever
11221.content:
Tommy Pickles had just turned two years old. He still wore his usual light blue t-shirt and white diaper with yellow tapes, but he had grown a small patch of purple hair on his head. His younger brother, Dil, was now one year old and could walk all by himself. Chuckie was now three, Kimi was now two and a half, and Phil and Lil were now two. Kimi, Phil, and Lil were now all potty-trained and no longer wearing diapers. Tommy and his friends were in the living room, talking about Tommy's second birthday party.

"That was the bestest birthday party I ever had, especially the cake." Tommy said to Phil and Lil.

"Yeah, it was the greatest. I wonder if your mommy and daddy are going to potty-train you since you're two years old now." Lil said.

"Yeah, I hearded that when you're potty-trained, that means no more wearing diapers." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Oh, yeah, I hearded about that, toos." Tommy said.

How did Tommy feel about being potty-trained?
11221.title: Story 1

12.content: Which of these will we focus on?
12.title: Chuckie Finster

121.content: Do the other babies convince him diaperes can be fun?
121.title: Diapers

1212.content: Do Stu or Didi make him wear a diaper after he has a potty accident?
1212.title: Other ideas.

122.content: Potty Training it is. Where shall we start?
122.title: Potty Training

choices: When Chuckie Tells the Babies About His Potty
When Chuckie First Has To Pee
1221.content: Chuckie Vs. the Potty it is. Now, where in the episode do we begin?
1221.title: Alternate Chuckie Vs. the Potty

12211.content: How will we alter this scene?
12211.title: The Beginning

12212.content: How do we alter this scene?
12212.title: When Chuckie Tells the Babies About His Potty

122121.content:
The babies were curious when they saw Chuckie's potty.

"What is it?" asked Phil.

"I don't know." replied Lil.

"Maybe it's a hat." Tommy said as he put the lid of the potty on his head.

"Nah, then what's the rest for?" asked Phil.

"Maybe it's a big mush bowl." Tommy said as he climbed into the potty and ducked.

"It's a potty! You guys won't believe what they're trying to make me do!" Chuckie told Tommy, Phil, and Lil.

"What, Chuckie?" asked Tommy.

"Yeah, what?" asked Phil and Lil.

"They're trying to make me... they're trying to make me... oh, I can't say it!" said Chuckie.

"Tell us, Chuckie." said Tommy.

"They're trying to make me... use that instead of my diaper!" Chuckie said as he pointed at his potty.

"Nah, that can't happen." Phil told Chuckie.

"Yeah, how's it gonna fit in your pants?" Lil asked Chuckie, who sighed unhappily.

"But Chuckie, they can't do that to you!" protested Tommy.

"Well, they're doin' it, they call it gettin' potty-trained! It's the worstest thing that's happened to me since my mom put me on the bottle!" Chuckie told his friends.

"What are you gonna do?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"I don't know, I've tried everything!" Chuckie told Lil.

"Maybe you could put a lot of napkins in your pants and use them like a diaper!" Lil suggested as she pulled up her dress, exposing her diaper.

"I tried it!" said Chuckie.

Does Chuckie re-attempt Lil's suggestion?
122121.title: Writer's Choice 1

1221211.content:
"Maybe it didn't work the first time because you didn't use enough." Lil told Chuckie. She, Tommy, and Phil went into the kitchen and got every napkin they could find. They soon came back with their hands filled with napkins.

"Okay, Chuckie. Let's try it again!" Lil told Chuckie. Chuckie held out his pants and Tommy, Phil, and Lil stuffed their napkins in it. Soon, Chuckie's pants were full.

"There. That should be enough to hold it." said Lil.

"Come on, Chuckie! Give it a try!" Phil told Chuckie.

Did Chuckie test the napkins out by peeing in them?
1221211.title: Yes

12213.content: This scene is altered in what way?
12213.title: When Chuckie First Has To Pee

choices: Didi Takes Chuckie to the Bathroom
122131.content:
Angelica was in the kitchen. She overheard Chuckie talking to the babies.

"Ha! You little babies really make me laugh! First, you cry for your mommies every time you get a little wet." She said as she walked up to the playpen.

"And now, finally, you get to go without em' forever, and what do you do? Chicken out! What's the matter? Little baby scared to be without his diapers?" She asked Chuckie.

"No, that's not it. I'm not scared. I... I just don't want to be potty-trained, that's all. It's just not right!" insisted Chuckie.

"Not right? Ha! That's a good one! Don't you dummies know anything? Everybody who's anybody is potty-trained!" Angelica told the babies.

"Well, not me, I'm never gonna do it! They can't make me! I'm gonna wear my diapers forever, and nobody is gonna stop me! Not my mom, not my dad, not the Present of the Beknighted Stakes!" Chuckie said proudly as he stood up. However, his speech soon came to a close when he felt an uncomfortable feeling.

"Because I..." he stammered.

"Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I..." Chuckie said as he put his hands over the front of his pants.

"What's the matter, Chuckie?" asked Phil.

"What's wrong?" asked Lil.

"I... I... I gotta go!" Chuckie exclaimed, and he began to cry.

What happens next?
122131.title: RC 1

choices: When Chuckie First Has To Pee
When The Babies Try to Potty-Train Spike
1222.content: Potty Training Spike it is. Where in the episode do we begin?
1222.title: Alternate Potty Training Spike

14.content: For Lil, our focus is diapers?
14.title: Lil Deville

choices: Betty Tries Out a New Diaper Brand
141.content: What will be Lil's diaper adventure?
141.title: Yup.

choices: Tommy Tells Lil to Take Off Her Wet Diaper
1411.content:
One day, Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, and Lil were all playing in the playpen of Tommy's house. They were all having a good time when all of a sudden, Lil sighed with relief as she wet her diaper. Lil's relief, however, was short-lived, as she now felt wet and uncomfortable. Betty had left Lil's diaper bag on the couch, out of Lil's reach. Tommy suddenly noticed Lil squirming uncomfortably.

"Lil, what's wrong?" Tommy asked Lil.

"This wet diapie's giving me a rash! I wish my mommy was here to change me." Lil complained.

What happens next?
1411.title: Lil Wets Her Diaper

14111.content:
Tommy thought for a minute, then he got an idea.

"Lil, if you don't want to wear your wet diapie, why don't you just take it off?" Tommy asked Lil.

Does Lil take off her wet diaper?
14111.title: Tommy Tells Lil to Take Off Her Wet Diaper

141111.content:
"Hey, that's a great idea!" Lil exclaimed. She then untaped her wet diaper, sighing with relief as it fell to the floor.

"I feel better already!" Lil exclaimed, then she walked away, leaving her wet diaper behind. Tommy, Chuckie, and Phil all walked up to Lil's untaped diaper and stared at the wet spot on it. Chuckie was disgusted, but Tommy and Phil were impressed.

"Whoa! Neat!" Phil exclaimed.

"Wow, Lil! You really had to pee!" Tommy exclaimed.

Does Lil take off the rest of her clothes as well?
141111.title: Yes

1411111.content:
Lil had suddenly remembered how much fun it was to be naked, so she decided to take off the rest of her clothes as well. She kicked off her shoes and socks, then she pulled her dress up over her head and tossed it aside. Before she knew it, she was naked. Tommy, Chuckie, and Phil all stared at her and gasped.

"Um, Lil?" Tommy asked Lil.

"Yes, Tommy?" Asked Lil.

"You didn't have to take off all of your clothes, just your diapie." Tommy told Lil.

"Oops. Sorry, Tommy." Lil said, blushing in embarrassment.

"Never mind. Let's get your clothes back on before your mommy sees you nakie." Tommy told Lil.

Does Lil succeed in getting her clothes back on before Betty sees her naked?
1411111.title: Yes

choices: Tommy, Chuckie, and Phil Helped Her
14111111.content: Did Lil get her clothes back on by herself, or did Tommy, Chuckie, and Phil help her?
14111111.title: Yes

141111111.content: Did Lil also put her diaper back on even though it was wet?
141111111.title: She Did It Herself

choices: Leave Lil Diaperless (And Start Potty-Training Her)
Put a Clean Diaper on Lil
1411111112.content:
Lil managed to get her dress, socks, and shoes back on seconds before Didi and Betty turned the corner, but she left her wet diaper off. When Betty saw that Lil had taken off her diaper, she was a little mad at her.

"Lilly, you know you're not supposed to take off your diaper, especially in someone else's house!" scolded Betty.

"Don't be too hard on her, Betty." Didi said when she picked up Lil's untaped diaper and showed her the wet spot on it.

"Lil was wet and she was probably just trying to change her own diaper." Didi told Betty. Betty now felt bad about scolding Lil.

"So, you tried to change your own diaper? That's my big girl!" Betty told Lil, who giggled happily.

As Didi went into the kitchen to dispose of Lil's wet diaper, what did Betty do?
1411111112.title: No

14111111122.content:
As Didi picked up Lil's wet diaper and went into the kitchen to dispose of it, Betty decided to put a clean diaper on Lil. She got Lil's diaper bag up from the couch and took out a clean diaper, baby wipes, and baby powder. She lay Lil down and pulled up her dress.

"Okay, Lil. Let's get a clean diaper on you!" Betty told Lil. First, she wiped Lil's bottom clean. Then, she powdered it. Finally, she taped the clean diaper onto it.

"There you go, all better." Betty told Lil.

Was Lil happy to be wearing a clean diaper again?
14111111122.title: Put a Clean Diaper on Lil

151.content: Her focus will be on diapers?
151.title: Angelica Pickles

choices: A tale from when she was still a baby
A story of her getting de-aged back to one year old
An alternate storyline to the episode "Angelica's Birthday"
1511.content: What kind of story will we involve Angelica in?
1511.title: Sure.

15112.content: She ends up de-aged due to a wish she, or someone else makes?
15112.title: A story of her getting de-aged back to one year...

151121.title: Yeah.

choices: She secretly wanted to be friends with the other babies

1511211.title: Yes

15112111.content: Secretly, she enjoyed a lot of what they played, and wanted to really join in on it, as a baby. She also missed being little, and hated how jearlous she was. She made the wish on a star?
15112111.title: She secretly wanted to be friends with the othe...

151121111.title: Yup.

All of Angelica's toys, save for her Cynthia doll, transformed into
more age-appropriate toys like stuffed animals.

Only her physical body de-aged while leaving her mind unaffected.

Did her clothes change as well?

choices: A smaller dress and a diaper

1511211112211111.title: Yes

choices: Another color or something else she noticed about it.
1511211112211111211131.content: She found it fit her rather well, straps and all. It was white?

15112111122111112111311.content: Did she like how soft it was?

151121111221111121113111.content: She did. Later on, she found she could still talk as herself?

choices: Nah, more baby-like, to her surprise.
1511211112211111211131111131.content: Did she still sound like herself as she said it?
1511211112211111211131111131.title: Yes

15112111122111112111311111311.content: What did Angelica do next?
15112111122111112111311111311.title: Yup.

151121111221111121113111113111.content: Did Angelica find a mirror to see how she looks?
151121111221111121113111113111.title: Writer's Choice 1

151121111221111121113111113112.content: Tried crying like a baby, to see if she could actually do it now that she was a baby?
151121111221111121113111113112.title: Writer's Choice 2

1511211112211111211131111131122.content: Did Angelica try to use her diaper?
1511211112211111211131111131122.title: Anything else.

15112111122111112111311111311221.content: What did Angelica try to do?
15112111122111112111311111311221.title: Yes

15112111122111112111311111311222.content: Did Angelica's tummy start to grumble?
15112111122111112111311111311222.title: Something else

151121111221111121113111113112221.content: What was Angelica's tummy trying to tell her?
151121111221111121113111113112221.title: Yes

15112111122111112111312.content: Was Angelica's diaper a different color or something else?
15112111122111112111312.title: Another color or something else she noticed abo...

1511212.content: Does one of the babies, or Susie make the wish, then?
1511212.title: No

15113.content: Will Angelica want to stay a baby in this alternate storyline?
15113.title: An alternate storyline to the episode "Ange...

151132.content: Does this take place at the end of the episode, where Angelica decides she doesn't want to act like a baby anymore?
151132.title: No

1511321.content: Will Angelica decide to stay a baby in this alternate storyline?
1511321.title: Yes

15113211.content: Does she ask her parents if it's OK?
15113211.title: Yes

151132111.content: Did Angelica's parents allow her to stay a baby?
151132111.title: Yes

15113211111.content: Did they realize Angelica was afraid of growing up?
15113211111.title: RC 1

151132111111.content: Did they give her rules to follow for this?
151132111111.title: Yes

1511321111111.content: What was their first rule?
1511321111111.title: Yeah.

15113211111111.content: She agreed. Other rules were...
15113211111111.title: No potty

151132111111112.content: Does she have to drink from a bottle?
151132111111112.title: SE

1511321111111121.content: Other rules were she'd have to go down for naps?
1511321111111121.title: Yes

15113211111111212.content: Will Angelica have to talk only in baby talk when in public?
15113211111111212.title: Any more.

15113211111121.content: What did Angelica's parents buy first?
15113211111121.title: Buy baby supplies

15113212.content: Upon seeing her friends hit the pinata, Angelica decided she didn't want to be a baby anymore. Did she also decide to take off her baby clothes to prove it?
15113212.title: No

151132121.content:
As Angelica watched her friends hit the pinata from inside the playpen, she began to regret wanting to act like a baby.

"I'm gonna miss all the chocolates!" She complained.

"By the way, Angelica, you can't have any of those little candies, neither. They're too dangerous for babies." Chuckie told Angelica.

"What? Why?" asked Angelica.

"Well, we might put em' in our nose or something!" Tommy told Angelica.

"Sounds like a few dumb babies have gone and ruined things for everyone! You can't do anything fun! I mean, look at me! I'm sitting here in a diaper, drinking from a bottle!" Angelica complained.

"It may not look like much to you, Angelica, but it's our world, and it's all we know!" Chuckie told Angelica.

"Yeah? Well, I'm not gonna play by your little baby rules anymore! In fact, I'm not even gonna wear these stupid baby clothes anymore!" Angelica told the babies.

Does Angelica take off her bonnet first?
151132121.title: Yes

1511321211.content: Next to go was the shirt?
1511321211.title: Yes

15113212112.content: Did she decide to take off her diaper?
15113212112.title: Something else.

151132121122.content: What made her want to keep it on?
151132121122.title: No

1511321212.content: What does she take off first?
1511321212.title: No, something else.

15113212122.content: Does she do so on her own?
15113212122.title: Her Diaper

151132121221.content:
Angelica untaped her diaper and let it fall to the floor of the playpen.

What does Angelica take off next?
151132121221.title: Yeah.

1511321212211.content:
Angelica untied her bonnet and angrily tossed it out of the playpen. Then she pulled her shirt up over her head and tossed it aside. She was now naked.

"Look out, Pinata! Here I come!" shouted Angelica. She jumped out of the playpen and raced towards the pinata. She pushed her friends out of the way, snatched the stick, and with one hit, she knocked all the candy out of the pinata. Everyone stared in shock when they saw Angelica naked.

What happens next?
1511321212211.title: Her Bonnet

15113212122111.content: Does Susie tease Angelica for being naked?
15113212122111.title: Reader's Choice 1

151132121221111.content:
When Susie saw Angelica naked, she laughed at her.

"What's so funny? Angelica asked Susie.

"It's a good thing today's your birthday, Angelica, because you're wearing your birthday suit!" Susie shouted. Everyone laughed at Angelica, who covered her naked body with her arms and blushed in embarrassment.

What happens next?
151132121221111.title: Yes

1511321212211111.content: He cancels the rest of her party?
1511321212211111.title: Drew Punishes Angelica

1511321212211112.content: Did Drew forgive Angelica seeing that it's her birthday?
1511321212211112.title: Something Else

15113212122112.content: Does Drew punish Angelica for taking off her clothes?
15113212122112.title: Reader's Choice 2

151132121221122.content: Did Drew let this slide seeing as it's Angelica's birthday?
151132121221122.title: No, something else.

1511321212212.content: Her shirt was next, then the bonnet. She changed back into her normal clothes?
1511321212212.title: Her Shirt

151132121222.content: Does one of the babies help Angelica take off her diaper?
151132121222.title: Nah.

1511321212221.content: Is it Lil that does?
1511321212221.title: Yes

15113212122213.content: Who helped Angelica take off her diaper?
15113212122213.title: Phil or Tommy.

151132121222132.content: Did she let him, though?
151132121222132.title: Tommy

1511321212221321.content:
"Tommy, I need help taking off my diaper." Angelica told Tommy.

"No problem, Angelica." Tommy told Angelica. He untaped her diaper and it fell to the floor of the playpen.

"There, it's off." Tommy told Angelica.

"Thanks." replied Angelica.

What did Angelica take off next?
1511321212221321.title: Yeah.

153.content: For Angelica's rival, do we focus on diapers?
153.title: Susie Carmichael

154.content: Which of these will we focus on?
154.title: Kimi Finster

1541.content: Do Chaz or Kira try out a new brand of diapers?
1541.title: Diapers

15412.content: Does Kimi go on some sort of diaper-related adventure?
15412.title: Hmm, anything else.

1542.content: Potty training it is. Now, what story will it be?
1542.title: Potty training

15421.content:
As a toddler, Kimi wondered what what it was like to use the potty, like her older brother, Chuckie. Whenever Chuckie needed to pee or poop, he would go into the bathroom and use the toilet. Kimi, however, wore diapers and needed to be changed.

One day, Kira had just changed Kimi's diaper. As she set Kimi down, Kimi saw Chuckie running to the bathroom. Kimi followed him inside, much to his ire. Chuckie liked having Kimi as a little sister, but he didn't always like the things she did. One of those things was follow him into the bathroom whenever he needed to use the toilet.

"You gotta stop following me in here, Kimi! Sometimes a kid needs his piracy!" Chuckie told Kimi.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie. It's just... I..." Kimi stammered.

"What, Kimi? What's so important that you gotta follow me into the bathroom?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"I just want to know what it's like to use the potty is all." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh." Chuckie said meekly. He now felt bad about snapping at Kimi, and was actually glad she showed interest in being potty-trained.

"Well, Kimi. I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Kimi.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Well, they do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone." Chuckie assured Kimi.

Does Chuckie try to teach Kimi how to use the potty?
15421.title: Story 1

154211.content:
"Would you like to learn how to use the potty today?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh!" Kimi said excitedly.

"Okay." Chuckie said, and he got out his old clown potty for Kimi to use.

"Here, Kimi. You can use my old potty. Since I started going potty on the toilet, I hardly ever use it anymore." Chuckie told Kimi, then he began to teach her how to use the potty.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to use the potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Kimi, and he pulled down his pants and underwear. Kimi then untaped her diaper.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do sit it on the potty." Chuckie told Kimi, and he sat on the toilet. Kimi then sat on Chuckie's potty.

"Then... I... go... potty." Chuckie said nervously. Kimi was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Nothing, Kimi. I'm fine!" Chuckie told Kimi. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he wanted to set a good example for his little sister. He closed his eyes and imagined Kimi wasn't in the bathroom with him. Then he sighed with relief as he peed into the toilet. Kimi watched Chuckie and tried to use his potty.

Does Kimi use Chuckie's potty?
154211.title: Yes

1542112.content:
Kimi sat on Chuckie's potty, but nothing came out. She stood up, looked into Chuckie's empty potty, and began to feel discouraged. Chuckie flushed the toilet, then climbed off it and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Chuckie, I don't think it's working. Nothing's coming out." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh. Sorry, Kimi." Chuckie said to Kimi as he washed his hands. Suddenly, he thought of something.

"Wait a minute, Kimi. Didn't your mommy just change your diaper?" He asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Then you probably don't need to go potty right now." Chuckie told Kimi, who still felt discouraged.

"Don't feel bad, Kimi. You can try again whenever you want." Chuckie assured Kimi.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Kimi said, feeling a little better.

"Now let's put your diaper back on." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom.

"Good. Now let's wash your hands and then we can play whatever you want." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi washed her hands, and then she and Chuckie went into their bedroom to play together.

What happens next?
1542112.title: No

15421121.content: Someone came over to the Finsters' house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
15421121.title: Reader's Choice 1

1542112121.content:
The doorbell rang and Kira answered the door. Charlotte arrived with Angelica.

"Hi, Kira. Thanks for volunteering to watch Angelica while I work today." Charlotte told Kira.

"No problem, Charlotte. You know Angelica is always welcome in our house." replied Kira.

"Bye-bye, Angelica. Mommy will be back soon. Be good for Mr. and Mrs. Finster, okay?" Charlotte asked Angelica.

"Okay, Mommy. I will." Angelica said to Charlotte, then Charlotte left. Kira took Angelica to Chuckie and Kimi's bedroom to play.

"Now, you play nicely with Chuckie and Kimi." Kira told Angelica.

"I will, Mrs. Finster." Angelica said to Kira as Kira left for the kitchen. As soon as Kira was out of earshot, Angelica groaned. She hated babies and dreaded having to spend the day with Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hello, Finster, hello, Shorty." Angelica said unenthusiastically to Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hi, Angelica." Kimi said to Angelica. Suddenly, Angelica sniffed. Usually around this time, Kimi had used her diaper and needed to be changed, but today, she smelled clean.

"Hey, Shorty, why haven't you used your diaper?" Angelica asked Kimi.

"My mommy just changed me before you came here. Asides, Chuckie's teaching me how to use the potty today." Kimi told Angelica. Angelica was shocked when she heard this. She knew that once Kimi was potty-trained, she would stop wearing diapers, and she couldn't call her a dumb baby anymore. She also knew the same thing would eventually happen to Phil, Lil, and Tommy. As much as she hated babies, Angelica took delight in tormenting them, so she decided to keep Kimi in diapers for as long as she could.

How does she do this?
1542112121.title: Yes

15421121211.content:
Angelica looked around. When she saw one of Kimi's clean diapers on Kimi's changing table, she got an idea. She picked it up and taped it on over her tights.

"So, Kimi, I heard you're going to use the potty today." Angelica told Kimi as she walked up to her. Kimi was surprised when she saw Angelica wearing one of her diapers.

"Angelica, why are you wearing one of my diapies?" Kimi asked Angelica.

"Kimi, why waste all your time learning how to use the potty? When you wear a diaper, you can go potty wherever and whenever you want." Angelica told Kimi, and she sighed with relief as she pretended to use the diaper she was wearing.

Did seeing Angelica pretend to use her diaper make Kimi have to use the potty?
15421121211.title: Reader's Choice 1

15422.content: Did Kimi want to be potty-trained?
15422.title: Story 2

info.brief_description: A story focused on the rugrats kids with Adventures In Diapers & Potty Training.
info.description:
Join The Rugrats In their Adventures with Diapers & Potty Training!
Rules:
1. Do not go Crazy.
2. Wetting is one of two Focuses.
3. Pooping in Diapers is The second focus.
4. Hang on to your diapies and enjoy what a baby's gotta do what a baby's gotta do!
info.pretty_title: A Rugrats Diaper & Potty train Adventure
